coverage_details.organ_transplant: Live & artificial organ transplant covered up to annual limit including heart, kidney, liver, bone, marrow, joint replacement including Knee
coverage_details.dental_general: Scaling twice a year; Crown and bridges covered up to 2,000 SR from dental limit
coverage_details.optical: SR 1,500.00; Frames & contact lenses covered up to optical limit
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: No pre-approval required for VIP members for outpatient & in-patient services, except where outpatient services have limits. Dental, cochlear and its battery, maternity, dialysis, and optical require pre-approval as per the plan.
coverage_details.special_instructions: Glasses and contact lenses covered with unlimited count up to optical limit. Cover Hajj, Flu and other seasonal vaccinations. Artificial Limbs, Prosthesis, Medical Equipment covered. Medical devices for diabetes, blood pressure monitors, sugar reading devices (including Free Style Libre), psoriasis tests/medication, allergy tests/medicines, vitamins/related medications if medically indicated, herbal medicines (SFDA registered), all medical tests/lab covered if prescribed. Pre-existing and chronic illnesses covered. Diabetic supplies, all durable equipment, life & non-life-threatening congenital illnesses, knee/hip replacement, cochlea including battery, caesarian up to max limit, optical for any age, medication limit equals pre-authorization approval limit.
